department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Intermediate Animation Workshop
course.meeting_text: Thu., 1-5, and weekly film screenings F., 1-3.
course.faculty_text: Ruth S. Lingford (fall term), Paul Bush (spring term)
course.description: This course offers returning animators a chance to extend and deepen skills and understanding of animation and to make a more substantial piece of work, alongside introductory level students who will learn some basic tools of animation. Additional exercises encourage students to challenge themselves and explore a range of creative possibilities.
course.prerequisites: This course welcomes both introductory level and intermediate level students.
course.notes: This course has an additional weekly film screening, Friday, 1-3 pm.
